content:
I think there might be some confusion here! Universal Studios Hollywood did have a "Taste of Universal" event, but it was a special limited-time event that took place in 2021, and it was not a regularly scheduled annual event.

The "Taste of Universal" event was a food festival that offered a sampling of food and drinks from various Universal Studios Hollywood restaurants and carts, as well as some specialty items. It was a unique event that was designed to give guests a taste of the park's culinary offerings.

While Universal Studios Hollywood does offer special events and festivals throughout the year, I couldn't find any information on a "Taste of Universal" food festival happening again this year. However, they do have various seasonal events and celebrations, such as Halloween Horror Nights, Grinchmas, and Christmas in The Wizarding World of Harry Potter.

If you're interested in visiting the Wizarding World of Harry Potter, it's always a great time to do so! The area is open year-round, and you can enjoy the immersive theming, shops, and attractions, including Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey and Flight of the Hippogriff.

If you're looking for food and drink options, Universal Studios Hollywood has a variety of restaurants and carts throughout the park, offering everything from classic theme park fare to specialty items and snacks.

Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with!
